consistency.translation[0].definitions[0: the quality of always being the same, doing things in the same way, having the same standards etc – used to show approval
Consumer groups are demanding greater consistency in the labelling of food products.
Consistency of performance depends on several factors.
There are checks to ensure consistency between interviewers.
consistency.translation[0].definitions[1: how thick, smooth etc a substance is
Beat the mixture until it has the consistency of thick cream.
consistency.translation[1].definitions[0: when a company uses the same accounting methods each year when it reports its results, so that the results can be easily compared
In his chairman’s statement, he spoke of the need for consistency in financial matters.
